TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewHeaderCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: Contains functionality common to row header cells and column header cells.

span.span: Contains functionality common to row header cells and column header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是基底類別的類別，其他標頭資料格，例如和。This class is a base class for other header cell classes, such as and . 若要建立自訂的資料列的標頭圖示或資料行的標頭字符，繼承自類別，並將功能加入至繪製您自己的圖示或字符。To create custom row header icons or column header glyphs, inherit from the class and add functionality to paint your own icon or glyph.

span.para: 當您衍生自並將新屬性加入衍生的類別，請務必覆寫方法，以便於複製作業期間複製新屬性。您也應該呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容複製到新的儲存格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是像按鈕，可以設定狀態，例如排序資料列層級選取範圍，或按下。A is like a button in that it can be clicked to set states, such as sorting or performing row-level selection. 屬性使用提供類似的視覺狀態的值。The property uses values to provide buttonlike visual states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，每當您衍生自並將新屬性加入至衍生的類別。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容會複製到新的儲存格，並確定也將複製的值加入至衍生類別的任何屬性。

When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定至如果以滑鼠左鍵按一下儲存格，而且標頭啟用視覺化樣式。The method sets the to if the cell is clicked with the left mouse button and visual styles are enabled for headers. 如需標頭的視覺化樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱屬性。For more information about visual styles for headers, see the property. 這個方法是類似於方法。This method is similar to the method. 它會呼叫在相同的情況下，在其中就會引發事件，但它實際上不會引發此事件。It is called in the same circumstances in which a event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.

When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料列的標頭資料格是可調整大小之資料列是否可調整大小或屬性設定為。A row header cell is resizable if the row is resizable or the property is set to . 資料行的標頭資料格是可調整大小之資料行是否可調整大小或屬性設定為。A column header cell is resizable if the column is resizable or the property is set to .

span.span: The default is if the cell is detached from a

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料格的資料列標題儲存格，則它會顯示其資料列是否可見並屬性是`true`。If the cell is a row header cell, then it is visible if its row is visible and the property is `true`. 如果資料格，則資料行標題儲存格，則它會顯示其資料行是否可見並屬性是`true`。If the cell is a column header cell, then it is visible if its column is visible and the property is `true`. 如果儲存格的左上方的標題儲存格，即顯示如果兩個和成立。If the cell is the top left header cell, it is visible if both and are true.
